response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $15,000 to you, based on your needs and preferences. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true worth and your budget, ensuring you receive a valuable asset at an attractive cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
